entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
